Articles.Content:
Kerbals gotta dance! But how can they? Just go out and dance? They would feel silly.

Use this craft to give your Kerbals a proper dance floor, complete with awesome light show. Requires both Infernal Robotics (for all the unpacking bits) and Aviation Lights (for the groovy light show).

Includes a lift booster to get you to Minmus or the Mun.

The file: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kerbal-dance-party/

http://youtu.be/7GnsgeQ17ug

Edited April 1, 2014 by RocketBlam

Funky.

Would be a fun challenge to try to land a "Dance Club" on every Moon and Planet.

It's one of the most complicated things I've built yet, and definitely the goofiest, but I like it. I don't even expect many people to download it (due to the mod dependencies) but I think I just did it so I could make the video.
Now all we need is to hold a dance party on a KMP server eh?

Very nice!!! I greatly approve of this (if you've seen my vids you'll know why!).

I particularly like the dance floor deployment process and the scanning white lights, that's a very nice effect.
It's nothing I'd really ever use myself, but it's a great design and you did an awesome job with the video!
This may not work with .23.5, apparently there are some glitches now with Infernal Robotics.
